client_collaboration: I prioritize client collaboration, fostering open communication
time_zone_flexibility: I'm very flexible with time zone communications
tech_enthusiast: Tech enthusiast with a passion for development.
wip_project: Currently building Figma clone for demonstrative purposes.
start_project: Do you want to start a project together?
animated_iphone_description: Recreated the Apple iPhone 15 Pro website, combining GSAP animations and Three.js 3D effects.
brainwave_description: Professional and modern design AI Chat website Brainwave, using Tailwind, React and Vite.
the_world_description: An interactive 3D model built in Three.js of the Earth.
movie_app_description: A React Native project of a fake streaming app.
frontend_engineer_mobile_intern_descript: As a part of a team, I assisted in the development of a mobile home banking app using React Native, performing a complete redesign, enhancing performance, and implementing features.
frontend_engineer_microfrontend_descript: As part of a team, I developed many frontends that were wrapped in a backend wrapper, for a banking client.
phase_1_description: We'll collaborate to map out your website's goals, target audience, and key functionalities. We'll discuss things like site structure, navigation, and content requirements.
phase_2_description: Once we agree on the plan, I cue my lofi playlist and dive into coding. From initial sketches to polished code, I keep you updated every step of the way.
phase_3_description: This is where the magic happens! Based on the approved design, I'll translate everything into functional code, building your app from the ground up.
header_footer_3: digital presence to the next level?
footer_paragraph: Reach out to me today and let's discuss how I can help you achieve your goals.
hero_title_2: Do you need a developer? Why not Fullstack!
hero_head_paragraph: Hi, I'm Emanuele, a Fullstack developer based in Italy.
